cause.description:
We are a group of people who are trying to find alternate sources of energy, because: 1. energy prices are high right now 2. Fossile Fuels create polution 3. Global warming is annoying, so lets hurry up and fix it.
If you have any more reasons to suggest why, please inform us, so we may convince other people to help.
Our Goal:
To create the worlds largest solar farm. Help research away to collect the energy from thunderstorms. Improve Solar Panels. Make solar panel production cheaper. Get everyone working on improving our living conditions. Remove the worries of globale warming
How to help us:
1. You can donate 2. You can invite everyone you can, i suggest you do this. 3. You can advertise this page to larger groups, where other people may be interested.
ThankYou:
For joining and supporting our cause.
1. Solar panels are the best.
2. Wind power is acceptable
3. Storms are the ultimate source.
cause.mission: Increase the amount of energy, which should reduce polution in our world.
cause.name: Alternate Energy Sources
